p: Villus height, crypt depth and villus to crypt ratios were measured at the level of the duodenum, as a read-out for the evaluation of intestinal health. Feeding of broilers with resin acids-containing diet had no effect on any of these parameters, which approximate the reference values for broilers (villus to crypt ratio of 8 for broilers at 23 days of age; [ 56]) (Table 5).
